name: v1_airquality
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool air_quality_by_api_ninjas.
Tool description: Get current air quality data for any region. See more info at See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/airquality.
API description: Fetches air quality data from the API Ninjas Air Quality API based on provided location parameters.

zip.description: ZIP code of the desired location.

city.description: Name of the city. Defaults to 'Seattle'.

lon.description: Longitude of desired location. If used, the **lat** parameter must also be supplied.

lat.description: Latitude of desired location. If used, the **lon** parameter must also be supplied.
